short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your web search experience with shortnets for popular websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your Chrome browsing with SearchWiz. Simply type your site shortcut and keywords, for example, "am: best price laptop," to instantly find what you need. Faster searching, limitless possibilities.

The search within the new tab is provided by Microsoft Bing. It will not make any changes to your browser default search settings.

By installing the SearchWiz extension, you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy elaborated on SearchWiz website:

End User License Agreement: https://www.searchwizext.com/#/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.searchwizext.com/#/privacy-policy
